DOC.brief_summary: The project three arm randomize control trial rural Cambodia design evaluate impact homestead food production ( home garden ) without fish pond versus control household food security , dietary intake woman young child , biochemical nutritional status woman , household livelihood 22 month period . Baseline end line survey conduct involve questionnaire blood sample .
DOC.criteria: Must represent woman . Must fall within `` poor '' category term community wealth ranking . Must access land ( include homestead ) agriculture cultivation . Must sufficient access labor undertake homestead production activity . Must keen interest participate action . Must least one child less five year age ( 80 % target household ) . Have suitable land pond preferably small pond In addition village model farm owner : Have least 1,200 square meter land use establish model farm ; Have disposable income invest model farm fencing land preparation ; Be productive , open new idea willing provide assistance household village ; Be able willing maintain VMF throughout year ; Commit provide input market support group member least project . None , n't meet inclusion criterion
